name: train production, passenger, regional | train, passenger, regional | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9300/documentation

The dataset represents the production of a regional train in Switzerland with a total weight of 171t and a life span of 40 years. 

Service starts with the material consumption for the production of the regional train.

The dataset ends with the production of one regional train. The dataset includes material consumption, transport, energy and fuel consumption. The disposal of the regional train is included as well.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/302:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock/3020:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Manufacturing data represents a train produced in Europe.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: In this study, a common SBB-regional transport train the “Kolibri” is modelled. The total weight of a Kolibri is 171 t. For a composition of such weight, 271 seats are offered. The average load is 17% (46 passengers). The yearly vehicle kilometre performance is 150’000 vkm. In this project is assumed a life span of 40 years, resulting in a total lifetime kilometric performance of 6’000’000 vkm and a life time transport performance of 276’000’000 pkm. Estimates for energy consumption for manufacturing is taken from Frischknecht (1996) assuming an electricity consumption and light fuel oil consumption of 2.7 MJ/kg material and 3.8 MJ/kg material, respectively.;References:;Frischknecht R., Bollens U., Bosshart S., Ciot M., Ciseri L., Doka G., Dones R., Gantner U. and Hischier R. (1996) Ökoinventare von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz. Auflage No. 3. Gruppe Energie - Stoffe - Umwelt (ESU), Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule Zuerich und Sektion Ganzheitliche Systemanalysen, Paul Scherrer Institut, Villigen, Bundesamt für Energie (Hrsg.), Bern
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This train type is used as an estimate for the entire regional train fleet.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data of the material composition and energy consumption is based on oral communication with an expert of one company and literature studies.
